name: Alan Liu

experience.title: Yale Student Developers
experience.detail: Working with the Reservations team to create and improve a media reservations system. Currently being used by over 25 instances on campus including Bass Library

bio:
Hi! When I’m not looking around in virtual reality, I’m thinking about how to make practical improvements to fix the little difficulties in life. Primarily a backend developer, with experience in Web & Android.
I’m always free to grab a meal or a chat. Drop me a message on facebook or shoot me an email .
smallBio: Changing how we live, one day at a time.
